long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extract jobs, salaries, locations from Indeed and exporting them to CSV, Excel or JSON file.

Our scraper simplifies the process of searching and extracting detailed job data, requiring no coding expertise.

# Features
✓ Extract jobs search results and all pages automatically
✓ Extract full descriptions of jobs 
✓ Export as Excel, CSV, and JSON	

# Supported fields:
- Position Name
- Salary
- JobType
- Shift And Schedule
- Rating
- Company
- Location
- URL
- PostedAt
- Description Text
- Description HTML
- External Apply Link
- etc.

With the Pro version and settings activated, you can get additional fields such as:
Description Text, Description HTML.

# How to get started?
1. Open indeed.com and conduct a search with some info like job title, company name, and location.
2. Click the Download button next to the “Search” button. Then just wait to scrape complete.
3. Once extraction is done, click 'Export'.

# FAQ
https://indeed-scraper.convlead.com/#faq
Encountering issues? Email us directly at support@convlead.com.

# Data Privacy
Your data's security is our top priority. Rest assured, all data remains on your device, ensuring 100% privacy and trustworthiness.

# Statement
Indeed is a trademark of Indeed Inc. Jobs Scraper for Indeed is not affiliated with, endorsed, sponsored, or otherwise related to Indeed, Inc. or any of its affiliates or subsidiaries.

# About Pro
Jobs Scraper for Indeed is a paid extension, you can get basic functionality and upgrade to get more functionality.
